channel.title: The Safehouse News
channel.description: The Rogue Community site for all your MMORPG news!!

item.title: Spring 2006 Anime
item.description:
Spring is coming up, and it means a new season of Anime series. This season is sure to please everyone, with a record of over 60 anime series. Within the article, you will find some summaries of the more well-known anime that's upcoming, and also a list of all the anime coming out, links to their homesite, and the day they air.

There will be first episode reviews when the series start getting aired, but here's a chance to prepare yourself for what series you may be interested in before actually getting them.

item.title: Vanguard March Beta Newsletter Leaked
item.description: The March Vanguard Beta Newsletter has been leaked and we've been given permission to officially report it.

item.title: Nvidia announces the GeForce 7600 and 7900 series
item.description:
Today nVidia updated its GeForce 7xxx series of cards with three more offerings that are sure to interest most gamers' budget.  In the high end segment (nVidia has quoted a rather large range of '$499 to $649') there's the GeForce 7900GTX, dropping down the the $299 range for the GeForce 7900GT, and finally the new mid-range GeForce 7600GT weighing in at an expected $199 or so.

To add some fuel to the fire ATi also today introduced their $249 msrp Radeon X1800GTO, a 12 pipeline version of the Radeon X1800XL which fills the gaping hole in their SM 3.0 card lineup between the Radeon X1600XT and the X1800XL.

item.title: The Vanguard Rogue: Straight from the Source
item.description: At Fanguard San Diego 2006, Fricka and I got to talk to Darrin McPherson about our favorite topic, Da Rogue. Within, you'll find all the info you need to know about the Rogue in Vanguard. What they do, why they rule, and what to expect. At last, The Vanguard Rogue.

item.title: Introducing the Vanguard Necromancer
item.description:
Your eyes do not decieve you, this is indeed a Safehouse report on a caster! Fear not, we haven't abandonded our Rogue sensibilities, but every once in a while, you come across something that is so cool, that even though it's not Roguish, it's worth sharing.

So without further ado, I give you The Vanguard Necromancer.

item.title: Vanguard Forums Update and Beta FAQ
item.description:
The badly needed overhaul of the Official Vanguard Forums is complete, and they are up and running again. Also, Sigil released a new Beta FAQ which you can read here.

You can also get yourself registered if you haven't already by signing up with the link on the main page.

item.title: Get Your Copies Today…
item.description:
Of the Burning Crusade, that is.  I just reserved my copy of “The Burning Crusade” yesterday at my local Game Stop.  They said that they were running out of their reserved copies, so go get yours now.


On a side note, the sales person said that they will call me in October, when it came out.  A quick check of EBGames Online comes up with a ship date of July.  I guess only time will tell.  Let’s hope it doesn’t turn out to be another Diablo…

item.title: GUUURGGLE GUUURGGLE GUUURGGGLLLLE
item.description: That is the sound that strikes fear, or at least revulsion, in most WOW players.  Whether you killed too many of those nasty creatures while leveling or you get aggro just trying to run through a lowbie zone; everyone knows that Murlocs are pervasive in the world of Azeroth.  However, there seems to be more to these creatures than we originally thought.  Find out more here about the creatures that seem to be the harbingers of more to come…

item.title: New Priest Talents Unveiled!
item.description:
Rumors have been flying around the many WOW sites about the update to the Priest Talent trees.  Well, Blizzard has made the new Priest Talents available to check out on their Talent Calculator.  Go here for a look at the new talents.

Although the release date of Patch 1.10 is uncertain, it will also contain the ever-promised weather effects and some new high level armor sets.  You can go here  to check out some movies of the new weather effects as well as see some of the new armor.

item.title: SOE Fan Faire registration open
item.description:
SOE will be holding another Fan Faire, this time in Atlanta. The event will run from April 6th through April 8th 2006.

Events will include "Live Tournaments", Fan Art contest, special MMO roundtable breakout sessions, and as always the infamous costume contest. There is plenty to do at these events, and after attending over 6 myself, I can say with confidence that you will not have a bad time if you attend.

Full details and registration information can be found at the Fan Faire site.

 

SOE Fan Faire registration
